relation: ↑ there are dozens of bugs reported already ↑ https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=811489 ↑ https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=641526 ↑ https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=811494 ↑ https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=811498 ↑ https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=811503 ↑ https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=811506 ↑ kmix doesn't show all input streams (bug not reported yet, not sure about reproducerä ↑ I haven't tested with printer, but rather enabled autologin which needs root too

↑ USB port works but Smolt page doesn't update ↑ Amarok fails to open an audio CD and after some time trying and closing it I received a notif. that couldn't find the sound card. Trying to launch alsamixer gives: "ALSA lib pulse.c:243:(pulse_connect) PulseAudio: Unable to connect: Connection refused". System sounds and pulse mixer (kmix) worked fine but something probably crashed after trying to make Amarok work (maybe ran out of mem).
